Course.Name: Engineer Comp Sci I Lab HON
Course.Description: The course includes hands-on instruction and laboratory exercises in developing programs written in a high-level object oriented programming language applying the principles taught in the CSCI 1378 lecture course. Co-requisite: CSCI 1378. Equivalence course: CSCI 1170. A student may receive credit in only one course Corequisite: CSCI 1378 (Honors).
Course.Course-attributes: Computer Science, CS Instruction Fee - LU
